DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: % Contribuição por Cliente
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#f0f0f0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":8,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019/11/01","endDate":"2019/12/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	top 15
        cli.Name as Client,
        iif(sum(sum(est.ValueWithoutVatIncome - est.ValueWithoutVatCost)) over () != 0, sum(est.ValueWithoutVatIncome - est.ValueWithoutVatCost) / sum(sum(est.ValueWithoutVatIncome - est.ValueWithoutVatCost)) over (), 0) as Contribution
from	Estimate est, WorkflowState wks, WorkflowStateType wst, CommercialClient cli
where	cli.Oid = est.Client and
        wks.Oid = est.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = wks.WorkflowStateType and
        wst.Status != 7 
group by cli.Name
order by Contribution desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Rentabilidade por Projeto
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":8,"WidgetRows":32,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Under Development","metricFieldValue":"DelayedUnderDevelopmentJobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with	t as 
		(
		select	bil.Company,
				bil.Client,
                bil.Contract,
                bil.Project,
                est.RelatedEstimate,
				sum(iif(bcl.RelatedCompany is not null, bil.ValueWithoutVat, 0)) as BilledInternal,
				sum(iif(bcl.RelatedCompany is null, bil.ValueWithoutVat, 0)) as BilledExternal,
				sum(bil.ValueWithoutVat) as Billed,
				0 as EstimatedIncome,
				0 as EstimatedCost,
				0 as EstimatedIncomeInternal,
				0 as EstimatedCostResources,
				0 as EstimatedCostThirdParty,
				0 as PurchasedInternal,
				0 as PurchasedThirdParty
		from	Bill bil, Estimate est, Client bcl, WorkflowState wks, WorkflowStateType wst
		where	est.Oid = bil.Estimate and
				bcl.Oid = bil.BillingClient and
                wks.Oid = bil.WorkflowState and
                wst.Oid = wks.WorkflowStateType and
                wst.Status != 7 and
                bil.[External] is not null  
        group by bil.Company, bil.Client, bil.Contract, bil.Project, est.RelatedEstimate
		union all
		select	est.Company,
				est.Client,
                est.Contract,
                est.Project,
                est.RelatedEstimate,
				0 as BilledInternal,
				0 as BilledExternal,
				0 as Billed,
				sum(eid.ValueWithoutVatIncome) as EstimatedIncome,
				sum(eid.ValueWithoutVatCost) as EstimatedCost,
				sum(iif(eid.Type = 0 and sup.RelatedCompany is not null and est.RelatedEstimate is not null, eid.ValueWithoutVatIncome, 0)) as EstimatedIncomeInternal,
				sum(iif(eid.Type = 2, eid.ValueWithoutVatCost, 0)) as EstimatedCostResources,
				sum(iif(eid.Type = 0 and sup.RelatedCompany is null, eid.ValueWithoutVatCost, 0)) as EstimatedCostThirdParty,
				0 as PurchasedInternal,
				0 as PurchasedThirdParty
		from	Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, WorkflowState wks, WorkflowStateType wst,
				EstimateItemDetail eid left join Supplier sup on sup.Oid = eid.SupplierCost
		where	eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
				eid.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                wks.Oid = est.WorkflowState and
                wst.Oid = wks.WorkflowStateType and
                wst.Status != 7
        group by est.Company, est.Client, est.Contract, est.Project, est.RelatedEstimate
		union all
		select	est.Company,
				est.Client,
                est.Contract,
                est.Project,
                est.RelatedEstimate,
				0 as BilledInternal,
				0 as BilledExternal,
				0 as Billed,
				0 as EstimatedIncome,
				0 as EstimatedCost,
				0 as EstimatedIncomeInternal,
				0 as EstimatedCostResources,
				0 as EstimatedCostThirdParty,
				sum(iif(sup.RelatedCompany is not null, por.ValueWithoutVat, 0)) as PurchasedInternal,
				sum(iif(sup.RelatedCompany is null, por.ValueWithoutVat, 0)) as PurchasedThirdParty
		from	PurchaseOrder por, Estimate est, Supplier sup, WorkflowState wks, WorkflowStateType wst
		where	por.Estimate = est.Oid and
				sup.Oid = por.Supplier and
                wks.Oid = por.WorkflowState and
                wst.Oid = wks.WorkflowStateType and
                wst.Status != 7 and
                por.[External] is not null 
        group by est.Company, est.Client, est.Contract, est.Project, est.RelatedEstimate
		)
select	com.Name as Company,
		com.Oid as CompanyId,
		com.HasImage as CompanyHasImage,
		'Project' as WorkOrderType,
		prj.Oid as WorkOrderId,
		prj.Number as WorkOrderNumber,
		prj.Name as WorkOrder,
		stg.Name as Stage,
        isnull(stg.Color, wst.Color) as StageColor,
		cli.Name as Client,
        cli.Oid as ClientId,
        cli.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		max(prj.BeginDate) as StartDate,
        max(prj.EndDate) as EndDate,
        sum(t.BilledInternal) as BilledInternal,
		sum(t.BilledExternal) as BilledExternal,
		sum(t.Billed) as Billed,
        sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is null, t.EstimatedIncome - t.Billed, 0)) as Unbilled,
		sum(t.EstimatedIncomeInternal) as EstimatedIncomeInternal,
		sum(t.EstimatedCostThirdParty) as EstimatedCostThirdParty,
		sum(t.EstimatedCostResources) as EstimatedCostResources,
		sum(t.PurchasedInternal) as PurchasedInternal,
		sum(t.PurchasedThirdParty) as PurchasedThirdParty,
        sum(t.EstimatedCostThirdParty - t.PurchasedThirdParty) as UnpurchasedThirdParty,
		sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is null, t.EstimatedIncome - t.EstimatedCost, 0)) as Margin,
        sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is not null, t.EstimatedIncome - t.EstimatedCost, 0)) as MarginInternal,
		iif(sum(t.EstimatedIncome) != 0, sum(t.Billed) / sum(t.EstimatedIncome), 0) as BilledPercentage
from	t, Project prj, WorkflowState stg, WorkflowStateType wst, Company com, CommercialClient cli
where	prj.Oid = t.Project and
		stg.Oid = prj.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = stg.WorkflowStateType and
		com.Oid = t.Company and
		cli.Oid = t.Client 
group by com.Name, com.Oid, com.HasImage, prj.Oid, prj.Number, prj.Name, stg.Name, stg.Color, wst.Color, cli.Name, cli.Oid, cli.HasImage
union all
select	com.Name as Company,
		com.Oid as CompanyId,
		com.HasImage as CompanyHasImage,
		'Contract' as WorkOrderType,
		cnt.Oid as WorkOrderId,
		cnt.Number as WorkOrderNmuber,
		cnt.Name as WorkOrder,
		stg.Name as Stage,
		isnull(stg.Color, wst.Color) as StageColor,
		cli.Name as Client,
        cli.Oid as ClientId,
        cli.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
        max(cnt.StartDate) as StartDate,
        max(cnt.EndDate) as EndDate,
		sum(t.BilledInternal) as BilledInternal,
		sum(t.BilledExternal) as BilledExternal,
		sum(t.Billed) as Billed,
        sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is null, t.EstimatedIncome - t.Billed, 0)) as Unbilled,
		sum(t.EstimatedIncomeInternal) as EstimatedIncomeInternal,
		sum(t.EstimatedCostThirdParty) as EstimatedCostThirdParty,
		sum(t.EstimatedCostResources) as EstimatedCostResources,
		sum(t.PurchasedInternal) as PurchasedInternal,
		sum(t.PurchasedThirdParty) as PurchasedThirdParty,
        sum(t.EstimatedCostThirdParty - t.PurchasedThirdParty) as UnpurchasedThirdParty,
		sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is null, t.EstimatedIncome - t.EstimatedCost, 0)) as Margin,
        sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is not null, t.EstimatedIncome - t.EstimatedCost, 0)) as MarginInternal,
		iif(sum(t.EstimatedIncome) != 0, sum(t.Billed) / sum(t.EstimatedIncome), 0) as BilledPercentage
from	t, Contract cnt, WorkflowState stg, WorkflowStateType wst, Company com, CommercialClient cli
where	cnt.Oid = t.Contract and
		stg.Oid = cnt.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = stg.WorkflowStateType and
        t.Project is null and
		com.Oid = t.Company and
		cli.Oid = t.Client 
group by com.Name, com.Oid, com.HasImage, cnt.Oid, cnt.Number, cnt.Name, stg.Name, stg.Color, wst.Color, cli.Name, cli.Oid, cli.HasImage
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: ? Margem por Cliente
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#f0f0f0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":8,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019/11/01","endDate":"2019/12/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	top 15
        cli.Name as Client,
        sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is null, est.ValueWithoutVatIncome - est.ValueWithoutVatCost, 0)) as Margin,
        sum(iif(RelatedEstimate is not null, est.ValueWithoutVatIncome - est.ValueWithoutVatCost, 0)) as MarginInternal
from	Estimate est, WorkflowState wks, WorkflowStateType wst, CommercialClient cli
where	cli.Oid = est.Client and
        wks.Oid = est.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = wks.WorkflowStateType and
        wst.Status != 7
group by cli.Name
order by Margin desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]
